column4: Heloooooooooooo Guys !! Okéé I'm aa Programmer And I need a Tool That modify text files ! Like when i want to make changes ( Exemple I want to change all the return=0 with return=1  so i need a tool to change them all ) HELP HELP HELP
Text editors depend on your preferences. Do you prefer something more simple and graphical or something more complex?
Sorry for that. Like babaei said, gedit is nice for simple stuff. If you want something a little more programming-oriented, I personally like geany.
By any chance, what's your primary language?
